definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]

sentences.english: And hairdresser, or to discuss it, after all, is the professional people ah.
sentences.chinese: 還是去和美髮師商量吧，終究人家纔是專業啊。

sentences.english: My hairdresser is an artist from France.
sentences.chinese: 我的美髮師是一位法國的藝術家。

sentences.english: Examples: Is it customary to tip hairdressers in this country?
sentences.chinese: 在這個國家慣例是要給美髮師小費嗎？

sentences.english: Many folks see their hairdressers more often than they see their doctors.
sentences.chinese: 很多人見他們的美髮師要比見醫生多。
